p: The selective delivery and the controlled release of an active compound increase its efficacy and are favored by the control of particle size and encapsulation in a suitable polymer. Several formats are possible: chews, gummies, liquids, gels, and capsules [ 63, 64]. Encapsulation is an essential step in supplement production and it is commonly used because not only does it allow the release of the Ï‰-3 FAs directly in the intestine but also protects lipids from oxidation, extending shelf-life and masking taste and smell [ 84].
